name: Project Configuration
description: Deployment URLs, test credentials, E2E testing config, API references

name: App Purpose & Core Principles
description: Application mission statement, core principles, target market, value proposition

name: Feature Inventory + Intent
description: Feature catalog with intent, connections, and dependencies

name: User Personas & Goals
description: User personas, goals, behaviors, pain points, and mental models

name: Architectural Decisions & Patterns
description: System boundaries, data flows, tech stack, patterns adopted

name: Testing Patterns & Coverage
description: Test strategies, seed data patterns, workflow validations, coverage expectations

name: Historical Lessons (Retrospectives)
description: What worked, what failed, patterns to avoid, hard-won wisdom

name: Process & Strategy
description: Branching strategy, testing approach, team decisions, deployment patterns

name: Workflow Chains
description: User journeys mapped to component steps, upstream/downstream dependencies

name: Sync History
description: Document sync timestamps, sources checked, drift detection
